## RequiredPropertyNamesOf type

Extract the property names of an object type that are required

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RequiredPropertyNamesOf<T extends object> = Exclude<{
    [K in keyof T]: T extends Record<K, T[K]> ? K : never;
}[keyof T], undefined>;
```

## Example


```ts
const y: RequiredPropertyOf<{ a: string; b?: number }>; // 'a'

```
